Method Detail

setLicenseContent

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setLicenseContent(byte[] data)
Set contents of license file

Parameters:
data - [in] Contents of the license file in a Byte array.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API must be called before running the player.

setLicenseFilePath

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setLicenseFilePath(java.lang.String path)
Set the location of the license file

Parameters:
path - [in] location of the license file.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API must be called before running the player.

setPreAgreedLicense

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setPreAgreedLicense(java.lang.String str)
Set pre-agreed license string

Parameters:
str - [in] Pre-agreed license string.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API must be called before running the player.

setColorType

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setColorType(VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_COLORTYPE type)
Set the draw color type

Parameters:
type - [in] Color type. Please refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_COLORTYPE.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API must be called before running the player.

setRenderType

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setRenderType(VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RENDER_TYPE type)
Set video render type

Parameters:
type - [in] Render type. Refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RENDER_TYPE. Default value is VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RENDER_TYPE.VO_OSMP_RENDER_TYPE_NATIVE_WINDOW for Android 2.3 or above; VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RENDER_TYPE.VO_OSMP_RENDER_TYPE_NATIVE_SURFACE for older.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API must be called before running the player.

enableDeblock

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableDeblock(boolean value)
Enable/Disable deblock. This is valid for H.264 and Real video. The default is enabled.

Parameters:
value - [in] Enable/Disable; true to enable deblock, false to disable deblock.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setDeviceCapabilityByFile

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setDeviceCapabilityByFile(java.lang.String filename)
Set the location of device capability file

Parameters:
filename - [in] Location of device capability file.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API should be called before opening data source. Returns error code if failed.

setInitialBitrate

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setInitialBitrate(int bitrate)
Set the initial bitrate

Parameters:
bitrate - [in] Bitrate.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. 
This API must be called after opening data source and before running the player.

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_PLAYER_ENGINE getPlayerType()

Returns:
Player type, refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_PLAYER_ENGINE.

setZoomMode

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setZoomMode(VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_ZOOM_MODE mode,
                                           android.graphics.Rect rect)
Set video display area Override automatic screen width and height adjustment according to zoom mode.

Parameters:
mode - [in] Zoom mode. Refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_ZOOM_MODE.
rect - [in] Rectangular area to be displayed.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

getMinPosition

long getMinPosition()
Get starting position

Returns:
0 for a VOD; TBF for a live stream (0 currently).

getMaxPosition

long getMaxPosition()
Get ending position

Returns:
the duration for a VOD; TBF for a live stream (0 currently).

setDRMLibrary

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setDRMLibrary(java.lang.String libName,
                                             java.lang.String libApiName)
Set DRM Library name and API name

Parameters:
libName - [in] DRM library name.
libApiName - [in] DRM library export api name.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful . 
This API must be called after init the player and before opening data source.

Parameters:
cacheTime - [in] Time to cache the analytics data.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

Returns:

Parameters:
type - [in] Connection type. VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RTSP_CONNECTION_TYPE
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

enableAudioStream

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableAudioStream(boolean value)
Enable/Disable playback audio frame. The default is enable.

Parameters:
value - [in] Enable/Disable; true to enable, false to disable.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful

enableVideoStream

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableVideoStream(boolean value)
Enable/Disable playback video frame. The default is enable.

Parameters:
value - [in] Enable/Disable; true to enable, false to disable.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful

enableLowLatencyVideo

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableLowLatencyVideo(boolean value)
Enable/Disable immediate video rendering. This function is only applicable to video-only streams. The default is disabled.

Parameters:
value - [in] Enable/Disable; true to enable, false to disable.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful

enableAudioEffect

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableAudioEffect(boolean value)
Enable/Disable audio effect enable. The default is disable.

Parameters:
value - [in] Enable/Disable; true to enable, false to disable.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful
